main event: An object was observed over Stoughton, Massachusetts on August 26, 1950, moving erratically at a low altitude with bursts of speed and flashing lights.
interesting points: The object was seen at approximately 2000 ft altitude,It moved back and forth and seemed to suddenly vanish,The observation lasted for 5-6 minutes,The weather was fair and clear during the observation,There was a report of a very bright light with a tail seen in the vicinity at a later date.
sighted object: an object with flashing lights, circular in shape, about the size of a car wheel
witness description: observer did not provide a detailed description
